ygData.msgSnippet: DEstructor quickly followed kit kat. he entered the hall to find Death awaiting him... We have a problem he said. The one called Phobia..he is a vile creature.

Subject: Re: A  light snack.

 DEstructor quickly followed kit kat. he entered the hall to find Death 
awaiting him..."We have a problem he said. The one called Phobia..he is a 
vile creature. I scanned his data tracks. What I found can not be described. 
You must understand he would have found away to kill us all if had the 
chance. I did what I had to do. He though I fear is not slain. When I killed 
his body many of these little spiders cvame out. I fear they may rebuild him. 
I wish to have them examined."
 Destructor put his hand on his old friends shoulder. "I understand but it is 
not my place...you must ask our leader. For undertanding." they both turned 
to kit kat in attention.
